version_description:
- Added 2 new cars
- Added horn (optional)
- Added new control mode: Analog Slider
- Added iOS7 MFi controller support
- Added fire effect for the second exhaust if available
- Added sharing option for the aftergame score screen
- Added cash doubler IAP
- City night now gives 2x cash
- Adjusted HUD button sizes for different resolutions
- The models of some cars are updated
- Traffic reacts better to horn/headlamp
- Fixed distance calculation
- Ambulance drives faster (if road is empty)
- Optimised app size
- Lots of bug fixes and improvements

- Added 3 new cars
- Added daily bonus mode
- Added iCloud Support
- You can now adjust traffic density in free ride mode
- Improved how cars behave at first gear
- Balanced powers of some cars
- Added a slight blow-off valve sound to some of the cars
- Added German, French, Russian, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Hungarian and Polish translations
- Lots of bug fixes and improvements

- iOS8 related bug fixes
- Performance optimizations

Important: iPhone 6 users, please disable "replays" in the options menu until the next update.

A big content update will be available in the following weeks. Thanks for your support!

POLICE CHASE
- As a police you have to capture the suspects
- Try to beat the scores in the new Police Chase Leaderboard

NEW CARS
- 3 new cars including a super-sport

GAMEPLAY
- Traffic is now slightly faster and can change their speed dynamically
- Now there is the option for left-handed traffic in two-way mode
- Ambulance siren no longer distracts the traffic, but you can use the horn instead

NEW LANGUAGES
- Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Swedish language support

OTHER
- Fixed performance problems on iPhone 6 devices
- Improved the road texture in the city night
- Lots of other fixes and improvements

NEW LOCATION
- Drive your car in the new beautiful rainy environment

NEW CARS
- Added 4 brand new cars to the collection

OTHER
- Improved the iCloud Drive support
- Improved iOS 8.2+ support
- Performance optimizations
- Lots of other fixes and improvements

NEW CARS
- Added 2 brand new cars to the showroom

MORE CUSTOMIZATION
- Added new customization: VINYLS!
- Added a color picker for unlimited colors!
- Added 22 new rims

NEW TECHNOLOGIES
- Added 64-bit support
- Added Metal graphics support

OTHER
- Graphical updates to some car models
- Redesigned user-interface
- Now you can share your car showroom image
- Performance optimizations
- Lots of other fixes and improvements

- Replay sharing is back! You can enable it in the options menu.
- Various bug fixes
